title: F1 2017 (RUS|ENG)[RePack] by xatab
description:
Year of manufacture: August 25, 2017
Genre: Racing
Developer: Codemasters
Publisher: Codemasters
Publication Type: RePack
Language: Russian / English
Language of voice: English
Tabletka: CPY

Description:
CREATE HISTORY - Defeat the world championship in 2017, beat all records on the fastest F1 ™
 machines and race on some of the most legendary F1 cars in the last 30 years. With an even deeper ten-year career, 
a more varied gameplay in the Championships mode and many other new options for both networked and single modes, 
the F1 2017 is the most complete and exciting F1 video game ever.

Based on the release of CPY
- Removed all the voice acting except English / Nothing recoded
- Game archives are not opened
- Version v1.6
- Includes all released DLC.
- Installation time 30 minutes on the HDD (Depends on the computer)
Repack from xatab
P | S
To properly save the game, you must enable indexing the save folder.
It will appear after the first start of the game in the folder "My Documents" - "CPY_SAVES"
Click the right mouse button, then the properties and others. We tick the box to allow indexing
There should be no more tick marks.
Change the language in the game settings menu

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 (64-bit versions);
Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100;
Memory: 8 GB
Video card: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
Sound Card: compatible with DirectX® 11
Free space on your hard disk: 32gb
